transcript: Whatever I'm doing, I want it to be with you. I mean, you're probably the one who wishes you were with somebody else. Somebody who didn't take everything so hard and who knew how to enjoy yourself.

segments.text: Whatever I'm doing, I want it to be with you.
I mean, you're probably the one who wishes you were with somebody else.
Somebody who didn't take everything so hard and who knew how to enjoy yourself.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Whatever I am doing, I wanted to be with you.  I mean you are probably the one who wishes you were with somebody else, somebody who didn't take everything so hard and who knows how to enjoy herself.
